quotes.message: We are not rich by what we possess but by what we can do without.
quotes.name: Immanuel Kant

quotes.message: Poverty is the worst form of violence.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: An empty stomach is not a good political adviser.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Poverty won’t allow him to lift up his head dignity won’t allow him to bow it down.
quotes.name: Madagasy Proverb

quotes.message: It is not the man who has too little, but the man who craves more, that is poor.
quotes.name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.message: Poverty wants much but avarice, everything.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: One must be poor to know the luxury of giving.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: In a country well governed, poverty is something to be ashamed of. In a country badly governed, wealth is something to be ashamed of.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Having been poor is no shame, but being ashamed of it, is.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Poor is the man who is not content with what he has.
quotes.name: Rita Gonzalez

quotes.message: Beggars can't be choosers.
quotes.name: John Heywood

quotes.message: Hunger drives the wolf out of the wood.
quotes.name: 14th Century French Proverb

quotes.message: Hunger is the best sauce.
quotes.name: French Proverb

quotes.message: Let your head be more than a funnel to your stomach.
quotes.name: German

quotes.message: No clock is more regular than the belly.
quotes.name: French

quotes.message: Plenty sits still, hunger is a wanderer.
quotes.name: Zulu

quotes.message: Poverty breeds discontent.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: What good is honor when you are starving.
quotes.name: Yiddish

quotes.message: An imbalance between rich and poor is the oldest and most fatal ailment of all republics.
quotes.name: Plutarch

quotes.message: Laws grind the poor, and rich men rule the law.

quotes.message: Poverty is the parent of revolution and crime.

quotes.message: I believe that, as long as there is plenty, poverty is evil.
quotes.name: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.message: There’s no scandal like rags, nor any crime so shameful as poverty.
quotes.name: George Farquhar

quotes.message: Money has been the most serious handicap that we have ever met. There are times when poverty is fortunate.
quotes.name: Clarence Darrow

quotes.message: Where people are really attached, poverty itself is wealth.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: We fought a war on poverty, and poverty won.

quotes.message: A decent provision for the poor is the true test of civilization.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: You can’t get rid of poverty by giving people money.
quotes.name: P.J. O’Rourke

quotes.message: Poverty is no disgrace to a man, but it is confoundedly inconvenient.
quotes.name: Sydney Smith

quotes.message: Poverty consists in feeling poor.

quotes.message: Affluence creates poverty.
quotes.name: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.message: Money is a poor man’s credit card.
quotes.name: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.message: Poverty sits by the cradle of all our great men and rocks all of them to manhood.
quotes.name: Heinrich Heine

quotes.message: When the rich make war, it’s the poor that die.
quotes.name: Jean Paul Sartre

quotes.message: For every talent that poverty has stimulated it has blighted a hundred.

quotes.message: Poverty entails fear and stress and sometimes depression. It means a thousand petty humiliations and hardships.
quotes.name: J. K. Rowling

quotes.message: Remember the poor, it costs nothing.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Poverty of goods is easily cured; poverty of soul, impossible.
quotes.name: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.message: Poverty it is life near the bone, where it is sweetest.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: The surest way to remain poor is to be an honest man.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: The inevitable consequence of poverty is dependence.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: The greatest hardship of poverty is that it tends to make men ridiculous.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: Poverty is the test of civility and the touchstone of friendship.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Poverty devastates families, communities and nations. It causes instability and political unrest and fuels conflict.
quotes.name: Kofi Annan

quotes.message: Poverty makes you sad as well as wise.

quotes.message: Poverty has many roots, but the tap root is ignorance.
quotes.name: Lyndon B. Johnson
